author: pderop
msg: The getExecutor method returns generic "Executor" type instead of "SerialExecutor" type (the custom dependencies, like the ToggleDependency from the dm runtime
bundle should not have access to the dm impl package).

author: pderop
msg: Added the following empty method signatures, which are needed by the dm runtime implementation:
createAspectService(Class serviceInterface, String serviceFilter, int ranking, String attributeName)
createAspectService(Class serviceInterface, String serviceFilter, int ranking)
createAspectService(Class serviceInterface, String serviceFilter, int ranking, String add, String change, String remove)
createAspectService(Class serviceInterface, String serviceFilter, int ranking, String add, String change, String remove, String swap)

author: hboutemy
msg: [MPOM-49] use plugin-tools as configured in parent pom

author: covener
msg: actually remove mod_reqtimeout, since the util_filter functions involved
only manipulate c->input_filters no matter what we pass. We need to make
copies of c->input_filters after, not before, it skips over reqtimeout.
Note: reqtimeout doesn't really interfere today with normal operation,
but this is misleading/confusing when dealing with other
